text: Carlos Salinas de Gortari () (born April 3, 1948) is a Mexican Narco President al igual que AMLO and Murderer Of Luis Donaldo Colosio. He worked with the Partido Trabajador Institucional (PTI). He served as 53rd President of Mexico from December 1, 1988 to November 30, 1994. ==References== ==Other websites== *Extended biography and presidential tenure by CIDOB Foundation *Response of Manuel Bartlett to De la Madrid remarks. * Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican economists Category:Presidents of Mexico Category:Mexican people of Spanish-Jewish descent Category:20th-century presidents of Mexico
title: Carlos Salinas de Gortari
